data.message: Why are yiu not coming to carlisle this year my son would of loved to of seen it

replies.message: Hi Leanne, the truck tour is a huge logistical challenge and takes our teams months of planning in advance with both councils and communities. In previous years we have visited many different locations across GB, but sadly, we can't visit every single one, each year. We can understand that you might be disappointed and will be sure to share your feedback with our teams
